instructions: Image titled Enable Cookies in Your Internet Web Browser Step 8 1 Open Google Chrome Image titled Android7chrome.png . Tap the Chrome app icon, which resembles a red, yellow, green, and blue sphere. You cannot change cookie settings in Google Chrome for the iPhone or iPad; they are already enabled. Image titled Enable Cookies in Your Internet Web Browser Step 9 2 Tap . It's in the top-right corner of the screen. A drop-down menu will appear. Image titled Enable Cookies in Your Internet Web Browser Step 10 3 Tap . This option is at the bottom of the drop-down menu. Doing so opens the Settings page. Image titled Enable Cookies in Your Internet Web Browser Step 11 4 Tap . You'll find this in the middle of the Settings page. Image titled Enable Cookies in Your Internet Web Browser Step 12 5 Tap . It's at the top of the screen. Image titled Enable Cookies in Your Internet Web Browser Step 13 6 Tap the grey "Cookies" switch Image titled Android7switchoff.png . This is at the top of the screen. The switch will turn blue Image titled Android7switchon.png , signifying that Google Chrome will allow cookies from now on. If this switch is blue, Google Chrome is already allowing cookies. Advertisement

Image titled Enable Cookies in Your Internet Web Browser Step 21 1 Open Firefox. Tap the Firefox app icon, which resembles an orange fox wrapped around a blue globe. You cannot change cookie settings in the Firefox mobile browser for iPhone or iPad; they are already enabled. Image titled Enable Cookies in Your Internet Web Browser Step 22 2 Tap . It's in the top-right corner of the screen. A drop-down menu will appear. Image titled Enable Cookies in Your Internet Web Browser Step 23 3 Tap . This option is at the bottom of the drop-down menu. The Settings page will open. Image titled Enable Cookies in Your Internet Web Browser Step 24 4 Tap . You'll find it near the middle of the page. Image titled Enable Cookies in Your Internet Web Browser Step 25 5 Tap . It's near the top of the page. Doing so prompts a pop-up window to open. Image titled Enable Cookies in Your Internet Web Browser Step 26 6 Tap . This option is at the top of the pop-up menu. Doing so enables cookies for your Firefox browser. Advertisement

Image titled Enable Cookies in Your Internet Web Browser Step 47 1 Open your iPhone's Image titled Iphonesettingsappicon.png Settings. Tap the Settings app icon, which resembles a grey box with gears on it. Safari is not available for Android platforms. Image titled Enable Cookies in Your Internet Web Browser Step 48 2 Scroll down and tap . It's about a third of the way down the Settings page. Doing so opens the Safari settings menu. Image titled Enable Cookies in Your Internet Web Browser Step 49 3 Scroll down to the "PRIVACY & SECURITY" heading. This section is near the middle of the Safari menu. Image titled Enable Cookies in Your Internet Web Browser Step 50 4 Tap the green "Block All Cookies" switch Image titled Iphoneswitchonicon1.png . It's on the right side of the screen. Tapping this switch will cause it to turn white Image titled Iphoneswitchofficon.png , signifying that your iPhone's Safari browser will now allow cookies. If this switch is already white, cookies are allowed in your browser. Advertisement
